Disease.Name: ALPHA-1-ANTITRYPSIN DEFICIENCY (AATD)
Disease.Summary: rare (1-5:10000) ;autosomal recessive;mutation in the SERPINA1 gene ; > 70 genetic variants (PI types) therapy: risks of smoking ! aggresive treatment of pulmonary infections enzyme replacement (pooled human blood or recombinant AAT) liver transplantation

symtomp.symptom: no clinical symptoms (probably) / no clinical significance
